definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame

sentences.english: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity, and save me from bloody men.
sentences.chinese: 求你救我脫離作孽的人，和喜愛流人血的人。

sentences.english: For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，你的仇敵都要滅亡，一切作孽的也要離散。

sentences.english: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge?
For surely your enemies, O Lord , surely your enemies will perish; all evildoers will be scattered.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，你的仇敵都要滅亡，一切作孽的也要離散。

sentences.english: or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?
sentences.chinese: 誰肯爲我站起抵擋作孽的。

sentences.english: Who will take a stand for me against evildoers?
sentences.chinese: 誰肯爲我站起抵擋作孽的。

sentences.english: Which goeth in company with the workers of iniquity, and walketh with wicked men.
sentences.chinese: 他與作孽的結伴，和惡人同行。

sentences.english: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge?

definition: disaster one brings on oneself/to be reponsible for something bad that happens to oneself/to have only oneself to blame
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
to be born under an ill star
to suffer as a consequence of one's own actions/you asked for it/to bring it on oneself (sth unpleasant)
to have only oneself to blame (idiom)/to bring trouble through one's own actions
to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
to be lacking in moral sense/to lack common basic respect for others/lacking in virtue/mischievous/wicked/cruel/mean
